text: General elections were held in Ghana on 7 December 2020. Incumbent President Nana Akufo-Addo of the New Patriotic Party (NPP) was re-elected in the first round after winning a majority of the votes. ==References== Category:2020 elections Category:2020 in Africa Category:December 2020 events 2020 general election Category:Elections in Africa Category:General elections Category:Politics of Ghana
title: 2020 Ghanaian general election
